predicate.note: Frames file for 'incriminate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: cause to look like a criminal

example.name: no attribute
example.text: A federal judge ruled that Imelda Marcos wasn't brought to the U.S. against her will and that marital privileges, which protect spouses from *trace* incriminating each other, don't apply in her case.
